mapper.insert: insert into student (ID, student_id, name, qq, career, data, school, link, declaration, brother, create_at, update_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{career,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{declaration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brother,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update student set student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, career = #{career,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data = #{data,jdbcType=BIGINT}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, declaration = #{declaration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brother = #{brother,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, student_id, name, qq, career, data, school, link, declaration, brother, create_at, update_at from student where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select ID, student_id, name, qq, career, data, school, link, declaration, brother, create_at, update_at from student
